text: Location of Levoča District in the Prešov Region Pongrácovce () is a village and municipality in Levoča District in the Prešov Region of central-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1297. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 540 metres and covers an area of 2.983 km². It has a population of about 100 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Levoča District
title: Pongrácovce
